mybooks.title: SOOLEY
mybooks.author: John Grisham
mybooks.summary: Samuel Sooleymon receives a basketball scholarship to North Carolina Central and determines to bring his family over from a civil war-ravaged South Sudan.

mybooks.title: A GAMBLING MAN
mybooks.author: David Baldacci
mybooks.summary: Aloysius Archer, a World War II veteran, seeks to apprentice with Willie Dash, a private eye, in a corrupt California town.
